mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (mem_name, mem_id, mem_pass, mem_address, mem_tel) values (#{mem_name}, #{mem_id}, #{mem_pass}, #{mem_address}, #{mem_tel})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member where mem_id = #{mem_id} and mem_pass = #{mem_pass}
select count(*) from tbl_member where mem_id = #{mem_id}
